column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: Fire engulfed homes in front of railway tracks in Russey Keo------According to preliminary reports
column4: the blaze destroyed 15 houses and 80 rental units. The cause is believed to have been an exploding cooking gas stove.------Nobody was hurt
column5: and 43 fire trucks were called out.The fire was completely extinguished by 10:30 am.------UPDATE: Later reports say a woman’s body was discovered in a burned room after the fire was put out.------According to the police report
column6: around 160 rooms of 160 families were damaged after the fire spread. ------PPR
